entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:01 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:01 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
